Object.Description: The pink lines on this hat are constantly moving in a spiral... It is.. so... hypnotising...
Weaved from a magical fabric which empowers your connection with the shadow realm and dark magic.
Channeling the lifeblood of the forest through this branch creates blinding flares. Also can double as a broomstick.
It spreads. It consumes. All shall fear the blightflame!
Stare into the abyss and it will never take its eyes off you.
Grip powerful enough to crush bones.
Heavy armor piece made out of bones of countless slain gods, it can withstand fire and thunder all the same.
Many who have tried wearing this had their skulls crushed by the sheer aura of the past owner. Your head fits in perfectly.
Don't think. Just crush.
...The harvest is bountiful this year...
The most handsome suit you can wear for a date.
A crude wooden seal carved out of the flesh of the Withered God. Their spirit now resides within, vowing to burn the realm to ashes.
Orb that holds ancient powers of hell, ready to be released upon the strongest of magic casters.
A sword with an impossibly sharp edge. It has been designed with holy magic to slash like no other blade.
I recognize that name!

Possibly the most delicious ill-gained boon you’ve stumbled upon thus far. Just holding it fills you with vigor, and each bite regenerates itself, ensuring that you’ll be satisfied for the rest of your days.
Golden crown of a Lion Prince, wearing this crown fills you with immense might and makes you a great leader who can lead any army.
Evil robe that reminds you of Shatters and what lays in there.
This massive shield was created for the wealthy and powerful Ogre kings as a sign of their unrivaled strength.
Your thirst for blood increases drastically when you wear this.
Looks like someone spilled ketchup on this mask...
Oh god, needles!!!
This candy is very soft and tastes like medicine...
This candy tastes like rat soup...
This candy is very crunchy and tastes like liquorice...
This candy tastes both sour and sweet...
A potion that increases your Skill XP Gain by 25% for 30 minutes!
A small shard of a cracked fallen star, use it to gain a small amount of Skill XP!
A big shard of a cracked fallen star, use it to gain a big amount of Skill XP!
A large shard of a cracked fallen star, use it to gain a large amount of Skill XP!
A vile concoction that reminds you of all the things that you have lost.

EffectInfo.description: Death Loot Boost doesn't stack and only gets overwritten by consuming another potion.

Object.Description: Ohh... Just what I needed!
A giant maggot egg. Hell is truly a terrible place to be in.

EffectInfo.name: Grub
EffectInfo.description: Chases nearest enemy to player and damages them for 400 damage every 0.5 secs

Object.Description: If you throw this at someone, it will definitely hurt.
Lightweight quick sword that allows you to swing it faster than any other sword creating series of attacks that are sure to shatter your enemy.
A really nice yellow coloured rubber duck that can be your best friend :).
Reward for getting third place in the SnowBaller Event in 2023!
Reward for getting second place in the SnowBaller Event in 2023!
Reward for getting first place in the SnowBaller Event in 2023!
Be very careful bro.
This one will hurt...
It looks very throwable.
Tokens obtained from Christmas Presents. When consumed at 100 quantity, you will get a random Christmas reskin of a Legendary item.
A colossal hammer, wielded by Santa himself. Just the cold surrounding the hammer is enough to kill unworthy mortals.
This beautiful suit was once worn by Mrs. Claus herself, before her unfortunate passing. Santa always keeps it by his side, so that he will never forget her warmth.

A scarf woven by a kindred spirit whose life was ended far too soon. They live on as a spirit residing within their creation, bringing joy and happiness to anyone fortunate enough to be able to wear it.
An ancient slate, once used by primordial spirits to create the titular Northern Star.
A festive hat lost to the depths of the Shatters, once worn by the King himself.

This skull was plucked from the drowned corpse of one of the Siren's dearest friends, killed mistakenly in a bout of mania. The Siren holds onto it both as a show of respect, and a grim reminder of the consequences of losing control.
A gift given to Abaddon by a caroller, one of the few instances in history of the demon sparing a human's life.
This shuriken ornament is meant to be hung on a tree. However, the shrapnel given off on impact is as dangerous as any other ninja star.
A mask lovingly crafted for a fox spirit that frequented the Magic Castle during festivities. Even the King of Magic was prone to having crushes it seems.
A scepter crafted from both Limon's essence and festive cheer, wielded by the Sprite God to decorate the sky in beautiful northern lights.
A book written by Santa Claus in the months between Christmas. The countless chapters reminisce of jolly days long past... like last Christmas.
During Christmas parties from before the Ancients were sealed away, it wasn't uncommon to see Geb blackout drunk dancing on tables with his bell necklace on.
A gift lovingly crafted and wrapped by Skuld for her lover. It never reached its owner.

EffectInfo.name: Elf
EffectInfo.description: Chases the nearest enemy, shoots enemies for 200 armor piercing damage every 0.5 seconds

EffectInfo.name: Elf
EffectInfo.description: Acts as a decoy and cannot be damaged

Object.Description: A beautiful katana surrounded in festive flames, perfect to roasting holiday treats and Grinches alike.
A personal favorite of Santa, this crossbow was capable of riddling Krampus with dozens of arrows before he could see his assailant.
An unwieldly blade once famously wielded by Saint Nicolas, back when he still went by that name.
The power of Christmas seems to have reverted the Curse of Withering upon the sacred branch. What once spread misery and loss across the Realm now bestows good faith and joy to all in it's path.
A disgraced horn that once adorned the head of the holiday horror, Krampus. One of his many close scrapes with Santa lead to him losing one of his beautiful horns.
Even the Ancients were partial to celebrating the holidays. Bes is said to serve delicious baked treats on his festive serving shields.
What looks like a snowball at first glance is actually a boulder coated in white paint. I expect nothing less from the guardian of the Goblin King's caverns.
In the dead of night on Christmas day, all that can be heard are the yuletide songs of the carollers who brave the dark to spread holiday cheer.

During early development of the Grinch Slayer line, the "Sage" suit was designed for supporting ground units with powerful spells. Due to countless "blood explosion" incidents, the designers of the suits were promptly arrested for treason.

During early development of the Grinch Slayer line, the "Jester" suit was designed for espionage and delicate extraction missions. The bells lining the suit gave away vital locations, leading to the project being scrapped.

During early development of the Grinch Slayer line, the "Enforcer" suit was designed for elf warriors to fight on the front lines. The electro-magnetic pulses proved fatal to volunteers, leading to an emergency recall.
Tokens obtained from Christmas Presents. When consumed at 100 quantity, you will get a random Christmas reskin of a Legendary item.
Gives you a random cookie!
You have proven that you are the naughtiest player to ever exist, and for that you gain a trophy.

EffectInfo.description: This statue grants you +5% Loot Boost while in inventory (no stacking). However, if your account has any warnings, you instead lose -100% Loot Boost.

Object.Description: Presence of this ornament somehow increases your stats...
Presence of this ornament somehow increases your stats...
Presence of this ornament somehow increases your stats...
Presence of this ornament somehow increases your stats...
There's no way you just randomly found this.
You feel really lucky finding this weird cookie...
You are very naughty.

EffectInfo.description: Maybe you could make something more useful with this... You just need a bit more...

Object.Description: For the stressful times.
Homemade alcohol-free Eggnog. Made by Mrs Claus.
It looks happy and friendly :)
Why would they want to ban this?
A glass filled with lactose-free milk, just in case Santa is lactose intolerant.
A full cookie. Stolen from Santa Claus.
Who the hell leaves a cookie half eaten.

Object.DisplayId: Grinch Slayer Model Titan X-9000 V2
Grinch Slayer Model Titan X-9000 V2
Grinch Slayer Model Titan X-9000 V1

Object.Description: The Curse of Withering has tainted this once sacred branch. What once bestowed miracles to the land now desecrates all in its path.
You now know that grilled Hermit God tastes horrible, after having cooked some and eaten a skewer’s worth of it. Oh well, at least you can feed the seagulls with all of your leftovers.
This bauble perfectly captures the glistening facets of the Glacier Castle while shrouding the scene with snow. No shaking required!
A glorious tower shield embedded with the scales of the Crystal Serpent, coated in a sheet of rigid ice. The front is so cold that it freezes anything it touches.
A heart fully recovered from the past traumas. Thankful for your help it will now always be by your side.
A heart fully recovered from the past traumas. Thankful for your help it will now always be by your side.
A heart fully recovered from the past traumas. Thankful for your help it will now always be by your side.
A small shard of a broken heart that has been trapped in the forest's vines for many years. Maybe after collecting all the pieces you could save the poor soul?
A small shard of a broken heart that has been trapped in the forest's vines for many years. Maybe after collecting all the pieces you could save the poor soul?
A small shard of a broken heart that has been trapped in the forest's vines for many years. Maybe after collecting all the pieces you could save the poor soul?
Congratulations! You proved yourself to be an extraordinary ghostbuster. Your reward is a friend.
Gooey pink substance obtained from a rather friendly ghost, it feels like friendship to the touch...

EffectInfo.name: Exterminate
EffectInfo.description: Use this rock to exterminate ghosts and extract ectoplasm

Object.Description: I thought this was just a rock...
Sword used for testing projectiles with circling shot pattern.
The pale face of the Kage Kami stretched across a slab of petrified wood. Running your fingers across its skin makes your soul shiver.
The hallowed chest cavity of one of the Screecher's hatchlings. The weight of your actions makes you sick to your stomach.
A dull-looking prism adorned with the bloodied feathers of the Scarlet Screecher.
A cruel claw, used to tear apart wildlife and humans alike.

EffectInfo.description: H5 items have been removed from the game, you can fuse this item with any Downgrade Tablet to receive a refund

Object.Description: A magical ballista used by hunters to bombard their foes with a wave of powerful arrows. The relic has pushed the Hunter's magic further than previously thought possible.

EffectInfo.description: H5 items have been removed from the game, you can fuse this item with any Downgrade Tablet to receive a refund

Object.Description: A magical baton used by hunters to conjure spells to destroy their foes. The relic has pushed the Hunter's magic further than previously thought possible.

EffectInfo.description: H5 items have been removed from the game, you can fuse this item with any Downgrade Tablet to receive a refund

Object.Description: A magical shiv used by hunters to tear their foes to shreds. The relic has pushed the Hunter's magic further than previously thought possible.

EffectInfo.description: H5 items have been removed from the game, you can fuse this item with any Downgrade Tablet to receive a refund

Object.Description: A magical glaive used by hunters to decimate their foes. The relic has pushed the Hunter's magic further than previously thought possible.

EffectInfo.description: H5 items have been removed from the game, you can fuse this item with any Downgrade Tablet to receive a refund

Object.Description: A magical truncheon used by hunters to obliterate their foes with powerful spells. The relic has pushed the Hunter's magic further than previously thought possible.

EffectInfo.description: H5 items have been removed from the game, you can fuse this item with any Downgrade Tablet to receive a refund

Object.Description: A magical saber used by hunters to dismember their foes. The relic has pushed the Hunter's magic further than previously thought possible.

EffectInfo.name: Anvil
EffectInfo.description: To recharge the item, you must fuse it with Essence of Awakening.

EffectInfo.name: Monkey's Curse
EffectInfo.description: All your projectiles apply a Curse which makes you deal 20% more damage, but you yourself take 25% more damage. Effect stays between worlds.

Object.Description: What price are you willing to pay for your wishes?
Shiny golden medal in the shape of a four-leaf clover, you can attach it to your armor for better luck.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

EffectInfo.name: Anvil
EffectInfo.description: Fuse this medal with any legendary armor to replace the item effect with +10% Loot Boost. This can reverted by using a Downgrade Tablet, which also refunds the medal.

Object.Description: Teeth of a fire dragon who used to protect the entrance to old caves, where ancient civilizations first found fire magic.
This robe used to be worn by one of the popes of the God's Church. It is made out of a weird material that they called Angel's Skin.
A deviously designed teapot, filled with both a highly dangerous poison and a rejuvenating beverage, encased in separate compartments.
Think twice before wearing this, because if you do, then there is no coming back. You will become one of them forever and you will see them everywhere.

Powerful bow passed through generations of elvish archers, who honed its power by enchanting it with countless runes over the ages. This bow is famous for its destructive power capable of creating whirlwinds arround its arrows.

Stolen from the head of the dying Queen of the Moon very long time ago. This crown was once a virtuous relic that was passed down in the Moon Tower for generations. But its name has long since been dishonoured by the thieves.
Thin wooden wand that holds a crystal sphere which was tuned to cast explosions with a small delay, to protect the user from the enormous damage that this wand is capable of doing.
You may not be the strongest, but until the very last moment you will shine amongst others like a star.

One outstanding magician discovered a way to share magical power with even those who are naturally unable to cast any magic. His discovery has led to this cloak being created, which allows the user to hide their presence as long as they have enough magic.

At first glance you might not notice anything special about these garments, because they look just generic, but if you tried wearing these just for a bit, you'd immediately feel the power hidden within.
An old expensive watch that Anschutz' stole from a jewelry store. He is selling it now because he broke it.
A sacred garb adorned with small gemstones, brimming with a forgotten power.
In exchange for a lifetime of servitude and devoutness, the sage was paid with an entire dynasty’s worth of knowledge and wisdom.
Feared weapon of the devil's soul eater. It is known for murdering hundreds of innocent souls during crescent moons.
Power it with a great harvest of souls.
Demonically sharp shuriken stolen from the Devil himself. You can slice yourself with this to sacrifice your essence to Him for power.
Robe that completely covers you in shadows and hides your presence.
Terrifying bow crafted out of flesh of ink demons and a giant eye that still moves and stares right at you.
Many Rogues have tried to use this to escape their asylum. All have failed.
Pristine necklace of Ancient Warden that powered him with insane magic, it was a gift from gods for being a loyal guard.
Ring that holds the gemstone made out of all possible materials in the universe.
Golden crown that protects your entire head, it has a gemstone made out of enchanted ice attached that transfers all of her majesty to you.
Armor made specifically for the king of shadows to protect every part of his body with strong material and make his movements more superior.
Hellfire charged staff made out of fireproof metal used by the most worthy flamecasters.
A magical wand filled with tears of the Rainmaker. Strong force inside this wand turns all the tears into very sharp magic missiles.
A shining scepter that makes beautiful sounds that summon huge storm in assistance.
Lamp confining souls of legendary heroes from the ancient times.

Powerful staff that holds very old large crystal that was first found by the archivists of ancient times, the crystal still holds all of the knowledge that they wanted to spread. The power inside the crystal got only more grandeur with time.
Evil book made out of demon flesh filled with mysterious manuscripts written by the beings from Underworld.
Sharp blade of this katana has killed a lot of goblins, this deadly weapon was created only for one purpose.
This fortified blade provided an invaluable defensive advantage in combat against gladiators, as their swords could not strike past this colossal carrot.
Wand of the Gladiator Goddess, gifted to Furious Berserker as a trophy.
Lightweight quick sword that allows you to swing it faster than any other sword creating series of attacks that are sure to shatter your enemy.
This massive armor crafted from body of Aben is emitting huge amount of strength to protect you.
This bow was made out of Aben's remainings. It still is filled with his strength.
Thought to have been lost to the ages, the wisdom imparted in this tablet will summon a power unrivaled by any modern spell.
A great katana charged with the power of the sun itself.
A long lost artifact recovered by Davy Jones, believed to have been cursed by the gods of the seven seas themselves.

EffectInfo.name: On Use
EffectInfo.description: Throws a sea mine at cursor that lasts for 15 seconds

EffectInfo.name: Mine
EffectInfo.description: Chases the nearest vulnerable enemy within 7.5 sqrs after a 1 sec priming period, dealing 3000 damage within 3 sqrs

Object.Description: This massive shield was created for the wealthy and powerful Ogre kings as a sign of their unrivaled strength.
This helm was forged of metal that fell from the sky. It is strangely light and emits a faint hum.
A seal that is said to briefly borrow the power of the Gods themselves. Some Paladins shun its dark power, others embrace it.
This legendary dagger was commissioned by a band of mad rogues to prove the worth of the Dirk.
This orb of ancient bloodstone has a dark reputation of twisting those who wield it.
This basket may look harmless, but those eggs are no regular eggs. They are very highly explosive and will definitely hurt if someone throws one at you.

Legendary blade of the Rabbit Samurai. Unfortunately you have zero idea how to properly use this blade, as it requires special training. But even then, even the weakest of slashes absolutely destroy your enemies.
Ears of a female bunny. Almost like a curse, whenever you wear them, male bunnies keep walking up to you, offering you protection.
Biting on this you really start to feel like a bunny and begin running around like crazy.
The smell of this egg alone is enough to send you to heavens. It is incredibly lethal against your enemies.
A colored egg, stolen from the bunnies. You might be able to do something with this once you collect enough.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: A completely ordinary hat, you can probably fit a bunny inside and that's about it.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: A magical lace that was stolen from a mediocre magician, you feel as if you can wrap it around some hat.

Object.Description: Reforge Stone Lol

EffectInfo.description: This is a REFORGE STONE WOW!!!!!!!!!!

Object.Description: Magical rock found in the deepest caves of the Realm. It shimmers in all colors of the rainbow under rays of light.

EffectInfo.name: Anvil
EffectInfo.description: Combine this stone with any item on the Anvil to transfer the rainbow effect

Object.Description: WHY would you EVER use this?
Why would you ever use this?
Why would you ever use this?
Why would you ever use this?
A legendary relic, holding power that mere mortals could only dream of possessing. Combining this with a compatible Legendary item at the forge will awaken it.

EffectInfo.description: Combine this item with an applicable legendary to awaken its true power.

Object.Description: A mystical essence once used by an ancient civilization, thought to have been lost forever. Combining this with an Awoken Legendary at the forge will increase its power.

EffectInfo.description: Combine this item with an awakened legendary to further increase its power.

Object.Description: Beautiful looking wine sourced from Anschutz' own cellar. While it may look good, it doesn't seem to taste like wine. In fact, I'm not sure it's wine at all. It's as if someone poured grape juice into a cup and called it wine...
This FAMEous blade was forged after some guy tore a chunk out of a piece of fame, stuck it on a hilt, and called it a dagger. Somehow it worked?
A sturdily forged armor... Or is it a tuxedo? An armored tuxedo? Tuxedo armor? Who knows...
A masterfully crafted tuxedo. Yes, this one is actually a tuxedo... I think.
A beautifully woven robe... Or is it a tuxedo? A robe-tuxedo? Tuxedo-robe? Who knows...
A majestic and brimming potion that permanently grants your character +2 loot boost, up to a maximum of 10.
A potion that causes enemies to drop EVEN MORE loot!? Lasts 30 minutes.\nWARNING! If you have a weaker loot drop potion effect running, the timer will be reset to 180 min.
Anschutz' the Despair's lucky coin. It seems he ran out of ideas for items to auction.
A beautifully crafted diamond ring stolen from the hands of a loving bride. Wearing it makes you feel kind of lucky. Why? Why would I know?
A cookie that doubles your Skill XP gains for 2 hours!
A bunch of stolen souls packed into one big soul.
Magic mirror that is capable of moving you between planes.
Gives you enough skill points to max your character.
Old runic stone tablet with a powerful enchantment casted on it.

EffectInfo.description: Removes the third item effect from the top from the item. Does not refund the tablet.

Object.Description: Old runic stone tablet with a powerful enchantment casted on it.

EffectInfo.description: Removes the second item effect from the top from the item. Does not refund the tablet.

Object.Description: The true chaos was always hidden inside of this prism, letting all of it out for a normal human would be a grave mistake, but you found a way to use only a part of all the strength.

EffectInfo.name: Flame
EffectInfo.description: Shoots a 250 damage shot at the targeted enemy that inflicts Slowed for 4 secs, then chases the target, dealing 1000 damage within 3 sqrs

Object.Description: A small shard of a fallen star, you notice eight dots of different colors in the reflection.
This world must be cleansed.
Brooch that used to look gold is now covered in King's Madness, making it undesirable.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: Tattered and completely destroyed piece of cloth that burns your hands when you hold it.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: Page drowned in the madness of The King. All of the letters have been scrambled making it unreadable.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: Small petal of a blue flower that consists mostly of water.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: Green flame breath of an immortal nature dragon, despite his nature he can also bring death upon humans.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: Small rock from The Eternal One's garden, where all sorts of flowers grow and bloom for eternity.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: Hard and resistant to cold temperatures, these scales could very well be used to forge strong weaponry.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: Tiny iron brooch with a small topaz put into it, this brooch is given to all outstanding wizards in the castle.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: Leftovers of a fire dragon that you just fought. It's like a really hot sand that ignites when you collect enough of it.

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: "Even though exiled and forgotten, his loyalty was strong. And he ought to protect the kingdom where nobody waits for him."

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: "It is sad fate that he had to bear, even after his death, nobody remembered him and his efforts were all for naught."

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: A tattered piece of paper, the text starts out written with ink, but halfway through the ink is replaced with blood... "These pages will bear his legacy, and one day someone might find them and tell the world about a hero who he was."

EffectInfo.description: This item is used for crafting

Object.Description: The Monardian King’s royal garments, made of only the finest materials by the most skilled of artisans. Despite lacking magical enhancements of any sort, it's so well made that you can’t help but feel strong wearing it.
A dark seal fashioned out of some leftover scales that fell off of The Eternal One during your duel with him. Scary appearance aside, it provides great benefits to your longevity.
A large ritual mace, once used for devout worship by ogre cultists. This purpose was lost on the raiders who stole it, and has since been mostly used to bash people’s skulls in.
A walking stick given to the Monardian King by his late wife. Despite its sentimental value, he never used it, refusing to show weakness to anyone.
A book written by the Monardian King during his descent into madness. It starts off promising, but slowly devolves into insane ramblings and nonsense.

It is common practice in this kingdom to oversaturate dragonroots with magic in order to petrify them. This process leaves them incapable of bearing fruit, but transforms them into powerful rods used for channeling spells.
A skull taken from the corpse of a thief who tried to steal the fruits grown by The Eternal One. A dragonroot has since grown inside of the remains, imbuing it with powerful magic.
Ancient incantations woven into the fabric of this cloak allow its wearer to be shrouded in a mantle of flames for self-defense.

A katana crafted by a dragonborn swordsmith from the east, designed for beheading prisoners. Its lightweight appearance is a facade, as the blade itself is much heavier than one would expect from a mere glance.
A masterclass in ensuring a fatal strike, this shuriken shatters in midair to cause multiple entry wounds.
An incredibly lethal poison that has been laced with large amounts of sedatives made for the sole purpose of crippling large monsters.
A large dagger that has had many spells grafted into its blade, blessing it to be impossibly light and sharp. Even the weakest of slashes can pierce the strongest of armors.
A sacred garb adorned with small gemstones, brimming with a forgotten power.
In exchange for a lifetime of servitude and devoutness, the sage was paid with an entire dynasty’s worth of knowledge and wisdom.
An expertly crafted quiver, capable of firing blazing arrows that greatly injure any foe. Unfortunately, they burn a bit too well, sometimes turning to ash before reaching their target.
The whispers have now multiplied and it sounds like a crowd talking.

EffectInfo.description: Only one Soul of the Past can be used per player in Realm
You can't upgrade this soul any further

Object.Description: The soul became slightly louder and now you can clearly hear it trying to talk.

EffectInfo.description: Only one Soul of the Past can be used per player in Realm
You can combine 3 of these on the forge to upgrade this soul to level 3

Object.Description: Small fragment of an ancient soul, you can barely hear very quiet whispers.

Object.Description: Being one of the purest flames, it can envelop you with warmth that protects you for as long as it can burn.
Magic stone enchanted with hundreds, if not thousands of fire spells. It's barely holding itself together and it can explode at any time.
Brewed by an outstanding alchemist. This potion tastes a lot like grape juice and it boosts one's battle power for a short time.
Potion made with care and love by Acheron's lover, in hopes that it will treat any wound.
Flowers from The Eternal One's garden can bloom for centuries, outliving any mortal being. All this time they grow vines around them to protect their beauty.

EffectInfo.description: Protect you from projectiles for up to 2000 damage

Object.Description: Not all fruits are sweet in taste, this berry for example tastes more like gunpowder.

EffectInfo.name: Bomb
EffectInfo.description: Explodes after 4 seconds dealing 5000 AoE damage

Object.Description: An accursed orb that was once pure, bestowed unto humanity as a gift. Exposure to draconic magic over countless centuries has rendered it incapable of healing by normal means, forcing it to steal the life of living creatures in order to aid its bearer.

EffectInfo.name: Vine
EffectInfo.description: Damages the closest enemy within 6 squares for 1000 damage every second and applies Slowed for 1.5 seconds

Object.Description: Possibly the most delicious ill-gained boon you’ve stumbled upon thus far. Just holding it fills you with vigor, and each bite regenerates itself, ensuring that you’ll be satisfied for the rest of your days.
A cruel mockery of a holy lance that goes by the same name. Despite it being a shameless replica, it has comparable, if not even greater power to the legendary weapon it stole its name from.
The manifestation of pure madness. No mortal may wear this crest without losing themselves and everything they hold dear.
A powerful relic passed down from the ancient dragons to the first Dragonborns. Such power is impossible to harness for most mortals, leaving very few who can wield it.
An all-consuming flame, trusted to the Dragonborns since the dawn of magic. All who stand in your path will meet a swift death.

Forged by ancient archmages, it was meant to be used as a vessel for their souls when they die. However after being lost for ages, many void spirits found their home in this prism and as a result corrupted it.

EffectInfo.name: Dragon
EffectInfo.description: Chases the nearest enemy, shoots enemies for 200 armor piercing damage every 0.5 seconds

EffectInfo.name: Dragon
EffectInfo.description: Acts as a decoy and cannot be damaged

Object.Description: This fruit grows exclusively around places where nature dragons live. Juices of the fruits were used as treatment for King's ailment.
Handcrafted by the forest witch as a gift for her loyal guardian. It is adorned with both beautiful autumn leaves and created from the strongest wood around.
A small ornate trinket once used by Queen Stheno to protect her people. It has since been stolen, and used to wreak havoc throughout the Snake Pits.
A glowing golden rod comprised of sprite essence. The subtle waves of the scepter conjure stars every which way.
A disgraced holy sword wielded by a king among kings, now reduced to a handle and a broken blade. What’s left is barely longer than a dirk, as Caliburn has been proven nigh-impossible to repair.
A crude wooden seal carved out of the flesh of the Withered God. Their spirit now resides within, vowing to burn the realm to ashes.
Skuld’s most precious possession, an emerald locket given to them by their lover. Her humanity wasn’t the only thing she lost that day.
Once a flawless jade brooch, it has since been ruined by decades of neglect. This heirloom now shares the same unyielding resentment that Skuld has for the living realm.

EffectInfo.description: Chases the nearest enemy, shoots enemies for 200 armor piercing damage every 0.5 seconds

EffectInfo.name: Zombie

Object.Description: Ancient staff of the Serpent Cult. Cult leaders used it to punish apostates by turning them into serpents.
Encore! Encore! Encore! You hear voices demanding another show when you hold this crossbow. It seems like a chore, but let us show them a true Encore!
Weird item for your collection.
Weird item for your collection.
Weird item for your collection.
Weird item for your collection.
Weird item for your collection.
Weird item for your collection.
Weird item for your collection.
Usable 50000 Fame that you can add to your trades!
Usable 20000 Fame that you can add to your trades!
Staff enchanted by a cult of elite necromancers, presumably to achieve eternal life. Every dead soul remembered by this staff will forever stay with you, protecting you and fighting by your side.
Removes Accessory Dyes and Small Cloth.
Removes Clothing Dye and Large Cloth.
Old katana tempered in battles, it was used for training to become one of the best swordsmen.
A symbol of high society and great status.

This staff was once found inside of a long Ice Tower, those who touched it there were immediately turned into ice statues. By the day it was finally taken out of the tower, four different ice statues were holding the staff.
Festive spell used by Santa Сlaus' orchestra, it casts strong spells with a beautiful sound of Christmas Bells.
Every year at the exact same time a bright star would show up in the sky. Those delighted by this star crafted this ring and made it their symbol.
Put this hat on to celebrate the holidays!
Put this hat on to celebrate the holidays!
A circle shape that serves as a symbol of eternal life. You can now decorate yourself with it.
Orb that could freeze the soul of a living being. It contains power that is only found in the coldest places of the North Pole.
It is believed that this gemstone is so old it has seen the sun change its color, and it will live to see this happen many times again.
Robe made of very thin cloth that deflects any damage, it was worn by the most noble beings who would come down to celebrate another year's end.
Fully decorated holiday scepter hidden in Santa's secret vault. It is believed that this scepter was used to align the stars in the sky.
This magic wand was crafted to celebrate a bond between humans and gods and for that every god was asked to put a little of their power into it, to make this bond last.
Armor crafted by elven masters, designed to defeat all the naughty monsters that step on Santa's snowlands.

EffectInfo.description: The dragon within is not yet tamed.

Object.Description: Old wand that was used by the elves to decorate Christmas trees all around the globe.
Wooden helm with large reindeer antlers, decorated with a bunch of magical ornaments.
One of the twelve spears that protected the North Pole, they are known as Santa Claus' paladins. The other eleven remain in tact and protect their home to this day.
Magical dress stolen from the Queen of the North Pole's personal wardrobe.
Very sharp scythe blade held by a long candy cane. This weapon is considered a bit too dangerous, so you will never see an elf running with one of these.
Finest blade of the Santa's workshop, last of its kind. Countless battles it went through show that this blade cannot be broken.
A bright star that appears for Christmas to shine with its warm light. It's light has been burnt into this candy cane wand.
Long robe given to the most trustworthy elfs of Santa Claus.
A very cold staff that causes snowfall in any weather. It came somewhere from the North during a horrible storm and its origin is unknown.
Ring that gains power from the unending tradition of humans. Every December this ring glows with the shiniest light that cheers everyone up.
Unknown.
This armor will protect you from anything this year. Nothing can ruin your Holidays!
A mysterious quiver decorated like a Christmas Tree. Its existence boosts your holiday spirit when drawn.
Bow that creates magical candy arrows with every draw on its own. Truly powerful magic.
A seal that is said to be able to summon Santa Claus. Works only during December though.
Wooden bow accurately crafted by elves to be able to shoot gigantic candy canes.
Small iron coin crafted during the Age of Dragons. All coins from that period are said to give fortune when thrown into a Wishing Fountain.

Night in Hell is long and dark... Take this with you, it will help.
Pumpkin filled with 15 Halloween themed character skins that are exclusive to this box!
This necklace holds the Halloween spirit in its purest form, channeling it through your body makes you feel undefeatable.
This will protect you from all those evil scarecrows that keep coming!
Whoever boils dark magic in these pumpkins is definitely up to no good.
Still glows with the endless Halloween spirit.
Armor worn by the Pumpkin King's loyal guards. It lacks protection, but the Halloween spirit fills you with energy to fight.
Magic wand of the Pumpkin Witch who shows up only during Halloween to fill the Realms with pumpkins.
The perfect weapon for a pumpkin smashing rampage.
Old staff made of haunted wood during the first ever Halloween, to this day it burns with a yellow flame.
This bow is said to extend Halloween by 1 day for every arrow fired from it.
A key which opens an entrance to the Halloween Time!

Wand that was used by the high priestesses to channel our world with the world of gods to seek for a prophecy.
Old coin carved out of living wood, it still gives life to the moss growing on it. Collect and stack these on each other and exchange them for a great reward from Forest Theme Arena.
The most powerful tribesmen who used to rule the lands of the Realm one day got striked by Oryx's army, only few survived and they had to make a mask that would fear Oryx and defeat him.
Stunningly beautiful and shiny gemstone that was used by the Forgotten King to store his power in it.

Object.Description: Divinity of space and power of the strongest god are sealed inside of this scepter for your use.
Flask containing deadly poison collected from the rarest royal cobras in the realm.
Dreadstump? More like DreadCHUMP... Ahahahahaha!!!
Ancient stone wand with a bloody staring crystal that decides your fate the moment you look at it.

Mask made out of actual flesh, eyes and fangs of Arachna. Some tribesmen used this mask in their rituals to scare away the evil spirits.

Two unmatched daggers carved out of fangs of an elder dragon who swore to protect an entire continent and all of its people.

This amulet has absorbed the corruption of the Library over the years, giving it a unique sheen.
Robe that used to be worn by the students of Ink Library, many years had passed since that place got overtaken by corruption.
Cursed brush fully covered in the remains of demons that it used to create, the ink on this brush keeps living and starts moving as you hold it.
Incredibly long research and one thousand years worth of knowledge were all spent studying to finally create this wand.

Staff forged entirely out of blessed titanium, it holds a flawless ruby that was carved out of a god's eye. Such heavy weapon would simply be unusuable for a normal magician, however the mysterious power of the gemstone makes it more bearable.
Claw of a giant serpent living in the Realm's Jungle who still lives to this day.
Every part of this steel armor is protected with thorns of the most poisonous plants.
Shining ring that holds the core of the Realm's Jungle, the crystal contains so much life energy that jungle starts growing around you as you hold it.
Cloak of a great king, this cloak is his last regalia that was left after his unsuccessful attempt of resurrecting himself.
An intriguing staff found deep within snowy mountains with a power to carry out whatever you desire.
Bard's teal hat she worn during her performances.
Attire of a songstress who was capable of corrupting minds of those who heard her song.
The Skull of a seaborn monster from deep below.
A Tidecallers staff said to bring calamities upon nations.
That thing was too big to be called a sword. Too big, too thick, too heavy, and too rough, it was more like a large hunk of iron.
Axe that was born in the most violent storms, it is possessed by terrifying power that can shapeshift realms.
A lance with a firing mechanism added in to shatter any defences.
Mysterious sword that was found stuck inside an unnamed grave, it requires half the host's lifetime to burn with divine flames that turn demons to ashes.
Katana covered in the most poisonous vines and flowers, each attack almost instantly stuns your enemy.
Blade of this short dagger is nearly transparent because of its strong connection to original owner, who died many years ago.
A mythical red blade from ancient times capable of slaying gods paired up with a normal sword for when killing isnt neccessary.
Great scythe found on the shores covered in luminescent corals now yours to handle.
Sledgehammer used by a previous Sarkaz mercenary with some unreadable scribbles on it.
A red originium staff capable of manipulating fire, previously used by a Catastrophe Messenger known by the same name.
Very short blade of this heavenly katana was forged with the intent to heal or resurrect supernatural beings.
Small fragment of power of world building, it is only enough to change the appearance of your gear.

Battleaxe so horribly powerful, even gods feared it. In a desperate attempt to seal this power, gods separated lands of Hell from the overworld and drowned the Devil in a frozen lake right in the center of Hell, where the most sinful souls belong.

Ring stolen from a higher ranking demon of Hell. Infuses the wearer with the power of demonic vitality.

This amulet is cold to the touch, trapped within this amulet are the cursed souls of those who died before you. Enslaved to do the wearers bidding, even if that is to take your place in the afterlife. The chill is constantly reminding you of your sins.

Forged with a stolen eye and body parts from a forgotten demon of Hell. They melted it down into a pure crystal ball. The remnants of the spirit will amplify your attacks randomly.
Stone ring that barely holds itself together, on top of it is placed a gem that occasionally ignites without notice.
You picked up some of the concentrated darkness to throw at your foes. It weighs on your soul, yet protects you as well.
Contained within this orb is the Dragonfire of the Rage Dragons. The heat is unyielding, yet imbues you with power.

Staff designed by a blacksmith from Hell. It was completed using the bones of priests who fell in hell. Wielding it gives you an eerie holy feeling.
Holding this darkened dirk makes your whole being feel sluggish. What better time than now to take a small rest! Your party doesn’t really need you… right?
A wand once yielded by a priest of light who was sent to cleanse hell. They failed but their weapon is unyielding to hell's corruption.
The holy energy of this book was eaten by the flames of hell. It now whispers into your ears each time you use it

You don't know why, but you can't stop swinging it, as if your hands are moving on their own.
Clothes of those whose entire existence is all about greed.
Sorry, but it won't work on anyone other than you.

Object.Description: A really nice yellow coloured rubber duck that can be your best friend :).
A Gucci flask with some fake Gucci perfume, it's really better for killing someone than making them smell better.
Permanent piece of soap that contains the cleanest magic power.
A really expensive roll of toiletpaper.
You stole this broom from the Janitor in the 3rd dimension, who knew what this man was planning to do with this?
Hmm... Oh no! What? A man has fallen into the river? In LEGO City?!?
A cleaning liquid not used for drinking, however you do not care about this and you still drink it, now you use it as your spell?!?
A very old and dirty plunger that was cursed by the 3rd dimension monsters to shoot a magic blast whenever it was used, destroying all the toilets... And you found a better use for it...
A key which opens an entrance to the Bathroom, a forbidden 3rd dimension that could hide really terrifying surprises.
A key which opens an entrance to The Crawling Depths.
A rare sprout found in the Forest Maze that gives you a speed boost when eaten.
A key which opens an entrance to the Forest Maze.
It's cold in here.
A key which opens an entrance to The Shatters.
Finding this ring might have been a curse rather than a blessing, because after wearing it, you won't be able to take it off.
Gauntlet of the king's greatest guard who could beat a bear with his hands and fight entire armies.
Huge crystal orb with bubbles floating inside of it was placed into a wooden ring to power the keeper of this ring.
Ring of tormented spirits that have been consumed by this ring to summon undead armies.
A bottle with souls and haunting spirits that was found in the mystical forest.
A huge stone that was enlightened by the sun and charged with it's power.
Golden royal crown that was previously worn by the fallen king.
Moonsteel ring with a green flashing gemstone placed on it, just looking at this gemstone makes you feel uncomfortable, it represents all the pain of previous holder.
Amulet with emblem of the king that was a gift from people of his kingdom.
A necklace with many shining crystals attached, their shape reminds of a shark tooth, perhaps there is a crystal fish that lives very deep underwater.
Golden armor of the great magician that has been created with all the haunting spirits that followed him for his entire life, now all of their potential has been turned into one secure armor.
Demonsteel armor with many rubies placed on it to charge the wearer with power and agility. This armor was previously worn by the realm keeper.
Light robe of the fairy queen enchanted with her royal majesty.
Armor crafted by the minions of devil out of blood and strong ore, the devil has put an evil aura on this armor that brings fear.
Grand armor made out of highest quality gold and many different metals for the king of previously great kingdom.
White cloth robe with golden shoulders that was blessed by the heavens as a symbol of peace.
Golden Armor with a cape that symbolizes royalty and victory, looks like the armor was previously worn by a royal guard.
Smooth robe found in the church of previous wearer who was leading a cult.
Armor found very deep underwater, it seems to be created by some creatures that live underwater, it is decorated with shiny crystals that make armor look royal.
Crimson devil, the biggest fear of the realm from the past who slayed everyone only because he enjoyed it used to wear this cloak to receive incredible powers.
Tome of the Cultist Leader who spent his entire life writing this book to give it to his followers so they could use the prohibited power to summon unseen beings.
Great heavy shield made out many different metals creating an unbreakable protection for the wearer. In the past it was used by guardians of the king of great Kingdom.
Flask containing deadly poison collected from the rarest royal cobras in the realm.
Quiver made out of living wood and poisonous essence found in the mystical forest, arrows drawn from this quiver are capable of poisoning beasts to death.
Trap that can catch ghosts and steal souls from beasts.
Chakram of bloody reaper that is cursed with unholy aura. This chakram is capable of brutally slaying every monster on it's way.
Helmet of the Army Leader who was defending the Great Kingdom before it was turned into the Shatters.
White gold scepter that contains strong essence of inferno. Anyone to face this scepter's power will be struck by thousands of lightnings.
Orb crafted by fairies to hold their healing magic for helping lost adventurers.

Legendary sword with huge story behind it, this sword got all of it's fame because of the huge strength that it holds. Each slash with this sword takes so much strength that only the chosen ones can hold this sword.
Dagger of the crimson demon who had to slay everyone only to get their blood and craft this weapon.
Living wood crossbow enchanted with the power of mystical forest that can send strong shots that pierce anything, even the wind.
Strong wand of greatest magician that contains all of his strength and turns it into penetrating light beams.
Huge crystal with a shape of sphere that consumes all the light and turns it into magic was placed on an ancient cane.
Old cursed whip that was previously used for lion taming, now is a great weapon that brings the holder unluckiness.
Scythe of the reaper that is filled with blood and souls of previous holders.
Great power of the general who used this sword in the past can still be felt while holding it.
Royal dagger crafted from gold and decorated with red ribbons. This dagger was used by the guardians of a great king.
Staff crafted by the fairies from magic forest, not intended to kill anyone, but since it's in your hands...
Golden bow that demands souls, nothing can stop the arrow shot from this bow!
Wand of a great cult leader who tried to cleanse this realm from evil, but failed. Now, with you holding this wand the story begins!
Crystal katana that can easily create massive waves with each slash.

A wand that was forged in the depths of hell and enchanted with ancient runes. Magic enchantmetns on this wand make it shine like no other star in the universe. Anyone to weild this item shall recieve a curse on their name.
Do you feel it Mr Krabs?
Very stylish hat that looks very familiar, probably a reference for something... Inside of the hat you can find a name of the man who can wear this hat.

Incredible katana that absorbs any light and turns it into pure darkness, a very strong aura can be felt around the blade of this katana, it whispers the name of the only person who can hold this weapon.
A royal staff of incredible power, crafted by the greatest blacksmith, only 1 of a such staff can exist in the Universe, and only one man can hold it!
Charged with power of space and coolness, this great weapon can only be held by one man!
A great weapon fit for only one man.
Loaded with infinite amounts of snowballs that deal colossal damage to your enemies!!!
Ancient pencil that was sharpened till the point when it can slay monsters! Not to mention the dark aura around the pencil that is terrifying!
A key which opens an entrance to the Majestic Library, an ancient library that is as old as The Realm itself!
Book that holds the whole story of the realm in it, many secrets of the realm can be found in it. This tome took thousands of years to be written.
This toxin contains essence from the shattered mindstone and can let you control minds of anyone.
Ancient robe that was once worn by The Librarian herself, this robe was a gift from Oryx for her knowledge and great intellect that helped Oryx make his army stronger than ever.
A huge mindstone was put onto a ring to control minds of everything and everyone.
Knowledge is power. This staff holds power of all magic manuscripts of Majestic Library, it was used by The Librarian to create followers who would protect her.
A key which opens an entrance to Tomb of Undead!
A key which opens an entrance to Dojo!
Prism found in the Cloud Temple of Sensei, he used this prism to quickly move from his Dojo to earth.
Kimono that was worn for trainings, it is fashioned with sharp pieces of metal to protect the wearer.
A hat that was worn by Master Sensei, seemingly normal item can give a lot of strength to the warrior.
Very sharp dagger with many stories behind it, it was mostly used by ninjas to stab their enemies from the back.
Old shuriken made out of steel that is given to initiate samurais for practicing, the past owner's spirit was so strong that this shuriken evolved into a great weapon.
Armor that was worn by many Samurais, it was used for training the secret techniques.
Belt that was given to the greatest Samurai for his accomplishments, it holds his spiritual power that will be shared with you.
Katana that was crafted by greatest blacksmith who served oryx before he was sent to Dojo of Master Sensei.
A key which opens an entrance to the Hell Depths, a very deadly place controlled by Abaddon.
This ancient bracelet was made out of demon skin and blood. Worn by Abaddon to grant him infite powers.
Orb that holds ancient powers of hell, ready to be released upon the strongest of magic casters.
Got Blood?
Rip and tear until it's done.
By injecting modified demon blood into victims, Abaddon can search for vessels resistant to the volatile demonic energy. Unsuccessful targets, well, make for a nightmarish janitorial shift.
All the King's remainings were turned into a huge gem. Magic powers of the King of all Wizards are still very unstable. Wearing this ring requires huge will and strength.
This quiver is filled with King's magic powers, every single arrow drawn from this quiver will spread King's wrath on your enemies.
Majestically strong royalsteel shuriken that creates an empowering aura around the user with pure soul.
Ancient stone wand with a bloody staring crystal that decides your fate the moment you look at it.
Enormous power is trapped inside of the little crystal that is permanently attached to this wicked staff.

EffectInfo.description: The dragon within is not yet tamed.

Object.Description: Royal piece of armor with leader's cape attached, this armor was worn by the first general of Magic King's army.
Remains of the King of all Wizards were turned into a bow to be wielded by the strongest of human.
Gemstone made out of magic and dragon eye was attached to a metal ring to create massive amount of strength.
This robe was worn by servants of Magus to complete rituals that brought incredible power to their foes.
A book with ancient writings of the strongest magicians, Magus learned to control his power only because of this book.
Ancient weapon crafted from strongest magic metal that holds power of Magus.
Crafted by immortals, this axe was gifted to Magus to protect the Magic Castle.
A key which opens an entrance to the Forest Hideout, a building hidden in the forest to hide secrets of Realm!
Made out of leaves and magic, such a strong combo will protect you in your battles!
Many innocent souls were trapped in the Magic Forest, this cloak was found in the depths of Forest Hideout. When wearing this cloak you can hear souls whispering to you.
Katana that is surrounded by tongues of flames that attack your enemy and burn them with eternal flames.
Made out of ancient wood and Forest Magic, both found in the same place. This staff was used by Sylvia's minions to protect the Hideout.
The withered will burn, and their essence will be recycled toward new life.
Channeling the lifeblood of the forest through this branch creates blinding flares. Also can double as a broomstick.
This mask will unleash the hidden powers of the Tribesman.
There are still many layers to pass. You just need a little help.
Looks like the Tribesman has still got many secrets to reveal.
Once you pass through the door to the Core of the Tribesman, you cannot go back.
The power of the Tribesman is slowly turning into the dark side.
Not long until the Tribesman has fulfilled its mission in this world.
With the power of this mask, there is no one that can stand in the path of the Tribesman.
Honk Honk!
Stone mask where the King's spirit was trapped, his powers are completely in your hands, use them as you wish.
Demon Flesh and Hellhound's Spirit were turned into this brutal mask.
All the evilness that King Arthur had can be seen on this mask, it represents all of his doings.
This mask is filled with unknown force that makes you feel like you are controlled by someone...
Mask made out of ghostmetal that copies the face of Septavius, which grants you his ghostly powers.
The most powerful tribesmen who used to rule the lands of the Realm one day got striked by Oryx's army, only few survived and they had to make a mask that would fear Oryx and defeat him.
Crafted from burning material that magically empowers this mask and the wearer with warming energy.
This mask was made for Hunter Tribesmen, nobody knows what it is made out of, but this mask let's you take control of any creature's mind.
A rusty old katana.

Heavy armor that was crafted from lava, obsidian and magnetic forces that keep the lava floating around the armor.
Hellfire sphere that was made out of Hellhound's heart was placed in a wooden cane.
A key which opens an entrance to the Goblins Lair!
This scepter holds many crystals that were found in the Goblin Caves, these crystals are charged with dark magic that makes this scepter so powerful.
Sharp blade of this katana has killed a lot of goblins, this deadly weapon was created only for one purpose.
Amulet that was found deep in Goblin Caves, this amulet must have been worn by one of the cavediggers who spent his whole life in deadly caves.
Poison that was taken from the most venomous serpent in the world that can be found only in Goblins Caves, it's poison is known for having a helpful effect if consumed in very small doses.
Incredibly sharp dagger that was crafted by the best blacksmith of the realm for Goblin King.
Heavy armor dedicated to Goblin King sewn from golden strings and fashioned with glittering emeralds.
The feeling that you get when you hold this crossbow is indescribable, you feel the power of a thousand men, you feel like you can crush anything.
Every single person that was killed by the Ghost Knight was trapped in this one Vial, all their power makes this vial so unstable that it's almost uncontrollable.
Breastplate that protected the Realm from evil corruption. When the Ghost Knight died, this armor was hidden, so nobody can ever find it and protect the realm once again.
Helmet that was worn by the Strongest Knight of the Realm whose gear was turned into ancient relics and hidden deep underground, now that you obtained this helmet, you are a living legend.
This sword was lost for thousands of years, nobody could ever find this Legendary blade that could destroy any foe on command. Now, it is in your hands. Use it wisely.
Sealed energy of Halloween that will help you in your battles!

Spirit of Halloween is sealed inside this orb, his power is now yours!
A small pumpkin that is about to blow up!
A weird shaped pumpkin with two holes in it, can be worn by a human, not very effective you think. Wrong, it's not just a pumpkin, it's also some magic!
Yeah he still sees you and he still can talk! He is also a very good guy who I'd actually talk to!
Staff that is made out of pumpkins, this staff can even spawn pumpkins!
Head of the Pumpkin King was attached to a wooden wand only to make fun of him! That's not funny...
The pumpkin king was slain in his castle, his remainings were turned into this incredible bow!
This cloak turns you into a real vampire, try looking into the mirror while wearing this cloak.
Evil robe that reminds you of Shatters and what lays in there.
A key which opens an entrance to the Colosseum!
Ares has slayed thousands of people to become godlike and get this crown as a reward for being so powerful. Wearing this crown made him so powerful that he couldn't control his strength anymore.
A helmet that protected Ares in gladiator battles in Colosseum.
This spear was given to the best Gladiator of all time for killing thousands of men. He was the chosen one.
A key which opens an entrance to the Grim Reaper's Lair
A key which opens an entrance to the Magic Castle!
A long lost artifact recovered by Davy Jones, believed to have been cursed by the gods of the seven seas themselves.

Object.Description: Ancient relic that holds trapped souls of the Ancient Gods.
A shield that holds ancient powers of Bes himself, only the strongest can hold this shield.
Pristine longbow of curved shape which grants your arrows insane speed and power that will bring justice to all of your enemies.
A staff that holds incredible magic powers of the Snow Queen.
Golden crown that protects your entire head, it has a gemstone made out of enchanted ice attached that transfers all of her majesty to you.
Stunningly beautiful and shiny gemstone that was used by the Forgotten King to store his power in it.

EffectInfo.name: Gem
EffectInfo.description: Blue/Green grants Berserk/Healing on self. Red/Yellow deals 1000/750 damage every second within 6 squares, and Yellow also applies Armor Broken for 3 seconds on hit

Object.Description: Blade of the Forgotten Sentinel that has served it's order of protecting the great kingdom for millenias. An evil spirit can be felt within.
You’re strong. But I could snap my fingers, and you’d all cease to exist.
damn dude this shape is so uNeXpLaInAbLe oh wait It'S aN ErRoR! ;0 :amazed:

oof it's so slimy dang dude

bruh what a savage boss tbh
holy shiet that's crazy man
damn i guess he had to suicide rip ;-;
Yummy grape juice that will fully max your character's stats!
Sharp axe made out of ghostly metal that leaves a trail when you swing it, the axe is really light which allows you to swing it very fast. Thanks to: BLOODQWEN!
These legendary blades have killed lots of dragons, now they are in your hands. Thanks to: Omanoit.
The wildest demon of all was sealed in this scythe. This scythe is powerful enough to shred reality. Thanks to: Omanoit
This orb can even bring you back to the times when Soulhunters were alive...
This prism is so strong that it can confuse even the one who uses it!
Incredibly sharp shuriken that will cut through attire of any beast you will ever see!
This holy tome was used by the Soulhunters of Realm to heal them in battles.
Power that is trapped in this spell will destroy anybody who disturbs you.
Every arrow from this quiver will crush any enemy into pieces.
This scepter holds unbelievable amount of magic that will definitely crush anyone!
The seal that holds incredible strength that shows the true power of all the Soulhunters!
This helmet was worn by elite hunter's to protect them from huge beasts of Underworld.
This shield holds wrath of Underworld, it's ready to be released on your enemies.
A key which opens an entrance to The Atrax!
Infused with Dark Magic, this trap can catch any beast and torture him with the magic that pulses through the trap. Thanks to: Omanoit.
A protective cloth of Thessal decorated with magic treasures and fine gold plates. Thanks to: Omanoit!
This magic trap can catch anybody and anything, it also emits light that protects you.
This skull is a trophy for killing one of the hugest monsters to ever exist, this skull shows what a great hunter you are!
This poison was used to kill really big monsters within seconds.
This cloak is made out of cloth that is strong as steel, it protects you and the gemstone makes you even more protected!
This ring is made out of ice and Esben's remainings. You can still hear Esben calling into the darkness.
Dreadstump? More like DreadCHUMP... Ahahahahaha!!!
Hahahahahaha! What a comedy, my dude!
A book that learns you how to manipulate creatures and make them your puppets.
A ring that is filled with Arachna's poison that makes you feel weirdly stronger.
A very nice prism that makes you feel like a flying firefly on use!
High-tech styled armor that is made out of parts of Dr. Terrible's robot creatures and powered with large shining power cell.
A bottle filled with very deadly secret acid of Dr. Terrible, when touching skin of a monster it almost immediately burns them painfully.
A magic spell that will summon sacrificial blades and destroy your enemy on use.
My precious ring... What will you tell me today?
Cursed katana infested with unholy demon blood, it's mysterious power twists all of your attacks and makes them times stronger.
This colorful and sweet seal is often given to the candy creatures who choose the path of royal guards.
High sucrose dagger made out of strong-as-steel candies.
Moonsteel quiver decorated with metal that keeps the harvested souls of ghosts inside of it, making every next arrow stronger than the previous one.
Incredibly powerful staff charged with unknown strength, you can hear spirits praying to get out when you use this staff...
When worn, this armor makes you feel stronger even though it is made out of ice...
Coldsteel wand with a magic crystal fully covered in ice which causes all of your shots to turn into ice shards.
A robe that was made out of Stheno's skin and her magic blood that will fill your veins with her strength.
A huge blade that poisons all of your enemies on touch.
One very potent gem that glitters with the holiest light, it seems to be too strong for this universe, only the highest beings can touch this ring and not be gone forever.
One very potent gem that glitters with the holiest light, it seems to be too strong for this universe, only the highest beings can touch this ring and not be gone forever.

Such unbelieveable strength is coming from the stone that was attached to a ring so a human being can wear it.
This massive armor crafted from body of Aben is emitting huge amount of strength to protect you.
Unbeatable Strength of Aben pulses through this shield and is ready to be released on your enemy.
This bow was made out of Aben's remainings. It still is filled with his strength.
A magical wand filled with tears of the Rainmaker. Strong force inside this wand turns all the tears into very sharp magic missiles.
A cannister that is filled with tears of Rainmaker was attached to a rope to be worn by the ones who wants to feel the real strength of the rain.
A very sad story stays behind this armor... The story was about Rainmaker's fate...
A shining scepter that makes beautiful sounds that summon huge storm in assistance.
This interesting crossbow was cursed with the Rainmaker's tears and was turned into a enormous strength
This Cloak was worn by elite wizards to show their magical powers!
This candle burns a magical fire that will burn forever and will enstrength anybody who will touch it.
This magical armor will grant you real fire magic powers to throw fireballs in your enemies!
This magical hat was worn by the Scorching Magician to Make his Magical powers stronger in multiple times!
Hellfire charged staff made out of fireproof metal used by the most worthy flamecasters.
This shield was used in Gladiator Battles to protect Champions from attacks of Gladiators!
This heavy armor was worn by The Furious Berserker to protect him from his Enemies.
Wand of the Gladiator Goddess, gifted to Furious Berserker as a trophy.
This fortified blade provided an invaluable defensive advantage in combat against gladiators, as their swords could not strike past this colossal blade.
A small gem made out of Oryx's evil blood and mad essence. Despite its benign glow, its deadly aura can be felt from very far away.
Probably the strongest armor to ever exist, the blacksmiths forged it for many years for Oryx in hopes Oryx become indomitable.
Oryx may wield a gargantuan blade in battle, though this emblem controls Oryx's secondary and far more devastating weapon.
A fearmongering blade infused with the essence of countless beheaded heroes and capable of inflicting savage blows on any opponent who dares defy Oryx.
Safety First!
A Suit worn by men who weren't scared to fight the enemy!
Hey kid! Don't target people with guns, or it will turn out bad!
This Belt contains everything that the ninja needs.
Armor made specifically for the king of shadows to protect every part of his body with strong material and make his movements more superior.
A shuriken that is made for slaying gargoyles but will work just as well with slaying anything else.
This Katana was stolen from the King of Shadows.
This staff will rise an army of undead for you.
All of the Undead will rise for you if you wear this robe.
Green gemstone that whispers you stories of undead beings was attached to a blue cold string.
Crafted from the ores of deep space that grants you the incredible power of galaxy.
Lamp confining souls of legendary heroes from the ancient times.
A legendary orb that was holded by the Loremaker who could stop time whenever he wants to proceed in battle.
You can feel the pulsing strength of heroes of the past that goes through your body.
The staff wielded by the Legendary Wizard himself, capable of conjuring storms in a matter of seconds. Countless foes have met their end in a blinding flash of light.

A signature spell of the Legendary Wizard now properly refined through countless experimentation and mastery. Prophecies tell that a true master of lightning must also be a master of water and air, for one cannot conjure the perfect storm without these two.

EffectInfo.name: On Use
EffectInfo.description: Marks the closest enemy to your cursor for an electrical barrage.

Object.Description: A gift from gods. Last hope of the Realm. Weapon of a great hero who would defeat the corruption and save the Realm.
Skull powered with deadly essence that grants you the power of all undead beings.
On rare accurance you may find yellow glowing crystals grow in lava, one of those was placed on ring made out of Malphas' bones to make the power inside of the crystal usable.
A quiver that holds power of Malphas.
This bow was created by the Fire Beasts and then was burned to become stronger.
A hide that was made out of Lava Beasts skin.
Incredibly strong armor made out of the material unknown to a human and decorated with gold.
Ring that holds the gemstone made out of all possible materials in the universe.
A incredibly magical poison that will burn your enemies to death.
Suitable for practice.
Made out of the strongest cloth on all the universe and it's weight is incredibly low , very useful when having problems.
RUN FOR IT!!!
The lore says that this armor was worn by Gods when they were interrupted by their enemies to grant them infite powers of all alive.
Ice cool baby!

Equipped by those who have slayed the mighty dragon who terrorized the lands of the realm for millenias, this helmet is made out his bullet proof scales, but it also holds the curse that this dragon had to face for his entire life.
A Dagger that was found on the other planet?? How did it get in your hands cheater?
It's calling to the void so deep.. Don't get confused when holding it.
This legendary bow that could weave a spell that will destroy the whole planet was stolen from the god of seas himself. Use with caution.
Usable 100 Fame that you can add to your trades!
Usable 500 Fame that you can add to your trades!
Usable 2500 Fame that you can add to your trades!
Usable 5000 Fame that you can add to your trades!
Usable 7500 Fame that you can add to your trades!
Theres a fire, not really a storm but it sounds cooler.
Armor worn by the army of angels, crafted to increases the abilities of any who wears it. Lightweight and maneuverable, while providing the maximum defense possible.
Sword of Light, once wielded by the Archangel Michael, was forged for war with the Devil and his demons. Now you must carry on his work.
Helm of the Guardian. Created by the Gods for a great war with the creatures of the abyss.
A ring forged from holy light, created to defend against the minions of the dark and strike them down.
A legendary weapon, used by the archdemon Malphas in his long forgotten raids against the realm.
The Amulet used by Tartarus.
A swift and hungry blade that is never satisfied with just one kill.

A legendary katana made of blue steel said to be found in the deepest trenches of the ocean. Its attacks can create tremendous waves of water out of thin air that devastates even the most hardy of enemies.
Just you? I guess you don't have any friends to play with but don't worry we can still be miserable together.
The King's wife died here. For her memory. Thx to Jinx, to draw this set.
A dagger left behind from a great massacre in Bedlam Asylum.
Only heroes will be able to see and touch this divine item.
A Sword Forged By the gods with the intention of giving it to Oryx but a angel stole it and purified the sword.
The DJ God used this item in the past,and now,its you.
The DJ God used this item in the past,and now,its you.
A Beautiful Obsidian Sword with a Nintendo Symbol,Beautiful!
A Indestrutible Magical Armor.
This Ring was made with the Sheikahs Towers
This Robe was made by oryx with the intention of giving it to Elder Deathmage but a rogue closed the portal of Elder deathmage castle and now oryx uses it.
This Armor was made with Bedrock.
This dagger was thrown in abyss of demons lava..
One of the Dr Terrible's experiences.
The Nexus's army captain holded this weapon.
Hipster bro
Beautiful!
A Trident that was used by the Thessal,the mermaid Godess.
A Key wich opens the portal to Elder Deathmage's Castle
A key which opens an entrance to Burning Forest.
This spell contains all the powers of Ancient Warden, when casted, this spell can bring destruction.
Crush your enemies with the powers of the Ancient Warden.
You can feel the vibrations from stones that were place on this robe. They are making you stronger.
Pristine necklace of Ancient Warden that powered him with insane magic, it was a gift from gods for being a loyal guard.
A very old Necklace that contains Souls of Forest Guardians.
Armor crafted from nice piece of wood and decorated with crystal leaves, which grant magic powers to the wearer.
This scepter was used by Mages of Ancient Forest to protect it from intruders, but one day the barrier was destroyed and the forest was gone forever.
Lightweight quick sword that allows you to swing it faster than any other sword creating series of attacks that are sure to shatter your enemy.
This jar radiates with magic that filled the lands of Burning Forest and gave power to protect its inhabitants.
Even though overtaken by flames, this wooden robe resists the forest's curse and manages to heal itself and the person wearing it.
A helm that was made out of eternal flames and hard as steel wood, many guardians worn this helm to protect themselves from any threat.
This weapon was found in the long forgotten forest, blade of this katana was forged from magma and hard wood.
This bow was made out of the finest wood that cannot be burnt, a burning stone was attached to it to burn every arrow shot with this bow.
Golden crown of a Lion Prince, wearing this crown fills you with immense might and makes you a great leader who can lead any army.
Armor that was made by Holy Priests only to protect Maahes from any threat.
Blood of the mighty Lion and venom of the Lava cobras combined create an unbeliavably corrosive substance that is lethal to even the strongest creatures.
Blessed dagger made out of claws of royal War Lion whose strength was consumed by the God of War Maahes.
A very ancient amulet that was used to summon infinite amounts of souls who would fight for you.
Armor that holds all the chaos energy of Seth, a deadly essence was placed on this armor to reinforce it.
You have defeated the storm and have killed the God of Chaos to get this legendary Dagger, what a Legend you are!
A ring that is filled with all the extreme powers of stars, only the strongest of mortal can hold all this strength.
Ancient Robe crafted by humans and enchanted by the Sun God as a reward for staying loyal throughout centuries.
Divinity of space and power of the strongest god are sealed inside of this scepter for your use.
As powerful as a thousand Suns, all of this power is more than enough to pierce the skies and smite your enemies with power of gods.
A ring that pulses with holy power that will light the way for you and will defeat the death itself.
This robe was worn by holy cultists of the heavens to keep the world safe...
Holy Tome that was blessed by the Heavens. It is full of ancient runes and ancient egypt symbols, once spelled by a human, they get stronger in multiple times.
A wand that protected the Holy Cathedral of Ancient Temple for thousands of years.
I can feel their strength and agility in my veins...
You have never truly defeated us...
Helmet forged from two strongest metals known to man powered with fury of the Ancients. Supernatural essence found within grants you potentinal to become dualist.
You are not forgiven...or are you..?
That one charming song that makes you inevitable.
You never knew who she actually was, her true identity will stay unknown forever...
Till this day nobody knows who Siren is and how did she receive her strength, but we know one thing for sure, she uses music and her tears to create mysterious items.
This legendary blade was found deep in Flooded Caves, It's not just a regular sword, this sword can release it's true power only if the holder is brave enough to see it.
An acclaimed tool of musical justice used by Siren's sister. Unfortunately...
Splash!
Some pebbles.
Like Kebbels.
...darkness claimed her heart. This, while tainted, is the only memento that may exist of her.
This stone was used by Bloodbrother in his rituals to summon demons and bloody creatures who would protect him.
A heavy brutal fashioned robe protected with bones of the Bloodbrother and his goresome essence.
This helm was made out of bones of The Bloodbrother to provide his strength to the wearer.
Bloodbrother crafted this hide with his own blood and bones, he was doing a ritual to create some of the strongest armors in the realm, however he didn't expect it to be that hard.
A great source of power that is filled with blood was put into a strong bone.
Brutal blade of this katana was created with bones of Bloodbrother, unlike human bones, they are stronger than any metal known to a human, nothing can beat strength of this blade.
A key which opens an entrance to Barbarian Cavern.
Shiny blue crystals found growing in a cave on top of a mountain attached to a fine string, the crystals charge you with bravery of barbarians.
Heavy armor made out of cloth that keeps your body warm and strong even in the coldest winters.
Incredibly strong shield that has nothing to do with magic, it was made out of unknown metal that can only be found near the top of the mountains.
A result of dark magic being used by barbarians, this deadly axe was crafted by a mistake, but it turned out stronger than any other weapon.
A key which opens an entrance to Bloodbath.
A key which opens an entrance to Flooded Caves.
As eerie and painful as this substance feels to the touch, an odd feeling of familiarity pulses through your hand.

EffectInfo.description: This rune can be used only once per Realm

A clump of red slime infused with souls. What could be inside?
