EffectInfo.description: This is a spoiler! Tell G+ what you think it is.

Object.Description: Immeasurably juicy. Someone needs to investigate...
Unbelievably sweet. Someone needs to investigate...
Inexplicably... explicit? Someone needs to investigate...
Profoundly tart. Someone needs to investigate...
Unfathomably cosmic. Not even the gods knows why!
A coin infused with souls, sealed within a growth-inducing slime.
A coin infused with souls, sealed within a energy-condensing slime.
A coin infused with souls, sealed within a energy-radiating slime.
A coin infused with souls, sealed within a scorching nitrous slime.
A coin bloated with an abundance of souls, sealed within a cosmic unyielding slime.
... it calls for your name...

EffectInfo.description: Obtained from within the poolrooms. Combine them together and see what can happen!

Object.Description: Remnants of a soul released from ethereal bounds. Let its exuding light show you the path to victory!

EffectInfo.description: Apply this to certain legendaries to reveal godly power hidden within!

Object.Description: The reclaimed wings of a forgotten valkyrie hero regain their light as they resonate with the flames of the dragonborn, creating a vivacious tempo within the armor.

EffectInfo.description: The dragon's wrath is now tamed and reconstituted! The skies embrace you from above and below.

Object.Description: In ignorance lies true salvation. One who knows no pain shall feel no pain and will live in bliss.

EffectInfo.description: All is nothing - nothing too difficult for you at least!

Object.Description: Her final word was uttered with defiance: "Valor."

EffectInfo.description: Her curse is released. Unleash the fury of the hymns!

Splat! Now there's an oozy clone of you!
The properties of this slimy heart allow it to beat eternally.
Compressed with all of the blue slime needed for combat, this mask can absorb otherwise lethal amounts of energy before overheating.
A symbol of luminosity and strength bestowed upon only the most valiant of slimekin.
This portable chassis generates sharp slime protrusions when moved suddenly. Despite being made of slime, this material is great for cutting.
Instead of slicing opponents, this sword shoots explosive oobleck slime projectiles. Weak to armor.
If it can handle explosions at point blank, it can handle ANYTHING!
Since Gray Goo was not fashionable enough, Goomy decided to turn the lethal material pink.
Cosmic goo in refined, spherical form. Sometimes tells you the worst advice.
A key which opens an entrance to the Planet Atrax, a planet found in the different universe!

This crown was once worn by the strongest entity in entire universe, his power was so incomprehensible that everyone wanted to try and get at least a piece of it, everyone failed. One day the entity was gone and his crown got lost in the void of space.

Pair of daggers crafted from core elements of the universe. Both were found in the opposite ends of our galaxy. When these daggers touch each other, the whole universe slightly trembles. Thanks to: Omanoit!
This trap was used to catch beasts of enormous sizes.

Magic spell made by the destroyers of galaxy to explode planets on their will, the terrifying power that was once inside of this spell has been hidden since then, however a small amount of it is still present in it.
This bow was made out of a very strong material and was linked with powers of Rudus to crush his strength on your enemies.
Seal of the Dark Colossus that is set on the power source of Rudus.

Magnificent Orb that shines with divine light. A small pocket blackhole is captured inside of it. The blackhole stays very stable when inside of the orb, but when released, it sucks the life out of all nearby entities within seconds.
Robe worn by cultists from Planet Atrax. This robe contains powers of all stars in the sky.
Dagger with unbeliavable sharpness crafted from green crystals that glow with healing light.
A katana that was made from space dust and evil sorcery, every single of your slash will turn your enemy into ashes.
Ancient wand that was created with a purpose to protect Planet Atrax from intruders.
A flawless gem that is filled with passion of cosmos was set in a blue metal ring.
Legendary weapon that was gifted to Orin from Sulord and Rudus for his great powers.
A head of legendary champion who has fallen in fight with humans.
Every arrow drawn from this quiver will be charged with extreme power into your enemy leaving them no choice to survive.
Armor made out of unique ore that can be found on Planet Atrax, no other planet in our big universe has this ore.
A key which opens a portal to the Ivory Wyvern.
A key which opens a portal to Lair of Draconis.

A magic robe woven from enchanted threads of crystalline silk torn out of the water harvested from a great Water Dragon’s body.
Battle armor made from Fire Dragon scales, one of the strongest substances this world has ever seen.
A very old, broken and weak staff that holds hunter crystal of defensive magic that consumes the souls of your enemies to evolve itself.
